infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to let you upload profile pictures and tutorial content.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses your photo library to let you upload profile pictures and tutorial content.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app saves photos to your library when you download tutorial content.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses your microphone for video recording in tutorials.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow FitSAGA to access your camera to upload profile photos and record tutorial videos.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow FitSAGA to access your photos to upload profile pictures and tutorial content.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow FitSAGA to save photos to your camera roll when you download tutorial content.
